level.heading: DISCLOSURE OF AGENCY FUND DEPOSIT REQUEST DATA (ยง 15-2010)

level.text: Within two (2) business days from the day on which it is issued, the Agency Administrator shall provide for public review at least two (2) copies of any Notice of Agency Fund Requirements issued by the People’s Counsel to the Commission. Each determination shall be accompanied by the respective deposit request.

The Agency Administrator shall maintain for public review two (2) copies of all determinations by the People’s Counsel which result in deposit requests being submitted to the Commission. The determinations shall be maintained chronologically in two (2) separate files, one (1) file by docket number, and one (1) file by affected utility.

The Agency Administrator shall, upon request, provide copies (at cost) of any determinations by the People’s Counsel that result in deposit requests; however, no copies will be mailed unless a stamped and self-addressed envelope is provided by the requesting party, or unless as otherwise provided herein.
The Administrator shall compile and submit any reports required pursuant to D.C. Law 5-153.
